name: Deposit Uniswap v2 Liquidity

cow_hook_dapp.name: Deposit Uniswap v2 Liquidity
cow_hook_dapp.descriptionShort: Add liquidity from a Uniswap v2 Weighted pool after the swap
cow_hook_dapp.description:
Easily increase your position in a liquidity pool, adding both tokens in the right ratio.

 Whether you're seeking to increase your exposure to specific tokens or maximize the returns from your assets, this tool offers a quick and efficient way to enhance your liquidity position after a token swap, all in a smooth, efficient process.
